name: Animal Squad
description:
Find the evidence to bring the local Mafia Boss to fall!

And maybe you can save some animal friends while you're at it!

Tips:
search in the cabinets for hidden keys
look for the animals and free them!

(Windows version might run better!)

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Toggle Sneak: Shift
  • Interact: E
  • Use Animal: Left click on an object or enemy

Animals:

  • Rat: Can retrieve objects
  • Bird: Can distract enemies
  • Cat: Can activate objects and buttons
